I usually like original and creative movies, which doesn't follow the hollywood recipe for predictable and unintelligent films. But about this film I have to say:

It is the most pretentious, wannabe-artistic and confusing piece of shit movie I have ever seen. It has 0 artistic value, 0 entertainment value, and 1 craftmanship value (the 1 come from some nice nature shots, but even those are not anything special). 

If you want to waste a few hours of your life endulging yourself in the worst homanity has to offer in the art of filmmaking: then please watch this lump of shit.

I am sorry but if you appreciate this film (and don't just say you do because you want people to think you have fine taste, which you don't) you simply have a minor glitch in your brain. Please seek professional help.
Promising start, nice photography and a mood that fans of the genre will enjoy... but by act V the plot completely deteriorates into utter bullshit. What the hell where they thinking?
Suggestion: Watch the first 2 or so acts if you really loved Hrafninn flĂ˝gur... then go dl Herzog's Aguirre: der Zorn Gottes to see the bullshit acts V--> done right.
Don't let the Hollywood style trailers trick you, this is more Art House than Hollywood, if you like the director than you'll love the film. Watch Bronson to see if you like the taste.

UrHighness: Something tells me you're the one with a mental problem. If you had to work that hard to describe the movie as pretentious you're probably doing so to make yourself feel better for not liking the movie due to your own mental shortcomings.
